DOC.brief_summary: In phase I/II trial , evaluate novel combination chemotherapy , use concurrently radiation therapy , preoperative therapy locoregional carcinoma esophagus gastroesophageal junction . In brief phase I portion trial , determine whether 2 drug ( docetaxel/oxaliplatin ) 3 drug ( docetaxel/oxaliplatin/capecitabine ) use concurrently radiation therapy . If 3-drug regimen tolerate , phase II portion proceed regimen . If 3-drug combination consider toxic , phase II study proceed docetaxel/oxaliplatin combination radiation therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Therapy With Oxaliplatin/Docetaxel/Capecitabine Radiation Resectable Esophagus Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Upon determination eligibility , patient receive : Oxaliplatin + Docetaxel + Capecitabine + Radiation therapy If three-drug chemotherapy regimen , radiation therapy , tolerable , regimen take forward phase II portion trial . If three-drug regimen toxic , phase II portion proceed two-drug regimen Oxaliplatin + Docetaxel + Radiation therapy
DOC.criteria: To include study , must meet following criterion : Adenocarcinoma squamous cell carcinoma esophagus G/E junction .
